subject: DHL returned my order to the shipper
description_text:
Hello,


I just received a DHL notification that my order was returned to the
shipper from Hong Kong. The tracking number is 7604577212, and the package
was originally shipping to Kuwait.


Can you please confirm:


   1.

   Why it was returned?
   2.

   Can you resend it without extra charges?
   3.

   Can we correct the address or provide documentation needed for customs?


I am still interested in receiving the product.


Thank you,

Abdulrahman Mohammed

conversations.body_text: Hi Abdulrahaman Alhammadi,  Alright, we will contact the shipping carrier immediately to investigate the issue. If necessary, we’ll arrange a replacement shipment for you.

That's great, thank you very much.

On Mon, 16 Jun 2025 at 6:46 AM support@simsonn.com

Dear Simsonn Team,


Thank you for following up on my shipment. I’ve contacted DHL regarding the
return of the original package (Waybill: 7604577212), and they confirmed
that the issue was due to my name being incomplete on the shipping label.


To ensure successful delivery for the replacement shipment, please use the
following full and corrected details:


Full Name: Abdulrahman Abdullah Mohammed

Street Address: Street 21, Block 8

Housing Complex: Sakan Al Awqaf

City: Mubarak Al Kabeer

Postal Code: 47068

Country: Kuwait

Phone Number: 99164424


Please let me know once the new shipment is dispatched and provide the
updated tracking number. I’m happy to assist if you need anything further
from my side.


Thank you once again for your support.


Best regards


On Mon, 16 Jun 2025 at 6:47 AM Abdulrahaman Alhammadi <
starslight110@gmail.com> wrote:

> That's great, thank you very much.
>
> On Mon, 16 Jun 2025 at 6:46 AM support@simsonn.com

Dear Simsonn Team,     Thank you for following up on my shipment. To ensure successful delivery for the replacement shipment, please use the following full and corrected details:     Full Name: Abdulrahman Abdullah Mohammed  Street Address: Street 21, Block 8  Housing Complex: Sakan Al Awqaf  City: Mubarak Al Kabeer  Postal Code: 47068  Country: Kuwait  Phone Number: 99164424     Please let me know once the new shipment is dispatched and provide the updated tracking number. I’m happy to assist if you need anything further from my side.     Thank you once again for your support.     Best regards
Hi Abdulrahaman Alhammadi,    Please note that we have updated your logistics information.  New bill number: 2590487620
